title: Crab and Gruyere melts
ingredients: ['225g cream cheese, softened', '135g cooked crab meat', '1 clove garlic, chopped', 'salt and pepper to taste', 'hot pepper sauce to taste', '4 thick slices ciabatta bread, cut in half', '365g grated Gruyere cheese', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley for garnish']
